version_description:
1) New features: Push Notification Inbox & e-Fixed Deposit Placement
2) Miscellaneous Enhancements
Miscellaneous enhancements

Now you can enjoy more conveniences on the Maybank app with these newly added features:
- e-Duit Raya
- Salam & Menang
- Mobile Transfer & Cardless ATM Withdrawal
- Secure2u Mobile
- Add Favourites
- Apply M2U Premier Current Account

Thank you for using our App! We've been working to add on more features as well as improving the user experience.

- Secure2u, a brand new digital security feature that enables authorization of Maybank2u web transactions with Secure Verification and Secure TAC.
- Apply for Ezy Pay to easily convert your recent Credit Card purchases into affordable monthly installments.
- Apply for Balance Transfer and save on charges when you transfer other bank's credit card balance to Maybank.
Need a credit card that would complement your lifestyle? Save the drive to the bank and apply now using our app, it’s so easy!
Need a credit card that would complement your lifestyle? Save the drive to the bank and apply now using our app, it’s so easy!

Good news! Now you can add more than one Maybank2u profile on the NEW Maybank app! With this, you can simply switch between your profiles and have greater control over your finances in a single app. ONLY usernames that belong to you can be added to the app.

Deepavali is just around the corner! Light up smiles across miles by sending DeepaMONEY to your friends and family with Maybank2u. All you need is just a mobile number!

In addition to the Quick Touch feature on the app, you can now login and check your account balances securely using your Face ID or Voice ID that is unique to you.

With this latest release, Maybank app is the first in Malaysia to have all three Biometrics features for authentication.

The new Maybank QRPay feature on your Maybank app is now piloting at an exclusive location. You'll be able to experience this new feature near you soon.

What is Maybank QRPay?
A cashless payment method that will allow you to securely make payments from your preferred account, instantly.

Stay tuned for the official Maybank QRPay launch coming to you soon.
General bug fixes and enhancements to improve your experience on the app

Chinese New Year is all about prosperity and good fortune!

Get into the winning spirit by taking part in the Shake & Win contest. Try your luck, ‘shake’ the tree of fortune for your chance to win cool prizes worth RM3million.

Still queuing for new notes at the branch? Try e-Ang Pow, it’s a great alternative to cash and a fun way to spread festive cheer to your loved ones. You can send it to anyone with a mobile number!

Maybank app for iOS is now optimised for the iPhone X display!
And, general bug fixes and enhancements to improve your experience on the app
General bug fixes and enhancements to improve your experience on the app

1) New features: Push Notification Inbox & e-Fixed Deposit Placement
2) Miscellaneous Enhancements

The Maybank app just got better! In this new release, you can now make payment to your loan accounts on the go.
Update now!

Hi Maybank users!

We are excited to inform you that something dazzling has officially landed!

You can now play Jewel Rush to win cash prizes!

All you have to do is tap on the Jewel Rush game icon and tap on as many jewels as you can. Be on the lookout for the Bonus Jewel to earn EXTRA cash.

Update to the latest version of Maybank app now and start playing!
Hey iPhone users! Hope you had an amazing Raya :) We noticed that the barcode wasn’t appearing like it should have on the QRPay screen. Don’t worry, it’s fixed now!

Check MAE out — the only e-wallet with banking convenience that’s built for your mobile lifestyle. Looking to open a bank account online? Pay and split bills with friends after a night out? Buy movie tickets on the go?

It’s gotta be MAE.

Download this new update and experience a whole new banking convenience.

Update the Maybank MY app today to enjoy all the new features and a better banking experience:
1. DuitNow – A new to transfer and receive money via mobile number is coming soon
2. MYM2U Challenge – Now you can earn points by performing JomPAY transactions. The more points you earn, the more chances for you to win great prizes!

Update the Maybank MY app today to enjoy all the new features and a better banking experience:
1. DuitNow – A new to transfer and receive money via mobile number is coming soon
2. MYM2U Challenge – Now you can earn points by performing JomPAY transactions. The more points you earn, the more chances for you to win great prizes!

Check MAE out — the only e-wallet with banking convenience that’s built for your mobile lifestyle. Looking to open a bank account online? Pay and split bills with friends after a night out? Buy movie tickets on the go?

It’s gotta be MAE.

Download this new update and experience a whole new banking convenience.

Hello! So we have fixed the issue with iPhone XR users in this new update. Fret not, as this new version still packed with so much more than ketupats:

1. Check out our Hari Raya themed app
2. Enjoy awesome rewards when you send E-Duit Raya through QRPay and MAE
3. In this season of giving, you can easily make donations to Maybank Heart through the app
4. Make future and recurring DuitNow transfers through the app
5. Now, you can flash your barcode to the shopkeeper to pay with Maybank QRPay
6. You can buy KLIA Ekspres tickets through MAE
7. If you are new to MAE, you can make third party transfers to other banks

Okay, that’s all for now. Selamat berpuasa, guys and girls!
Hey iPhone users! Hope you had an amazing Raya :) We noticed that the barcode wasn’t appearing like it should have on the QRPay screen. Don’t worry, it’s fixed now!

Hi Maybank users!

We are excited to inform you that you can now search for promotions according to categories and find what promotions are available nearby you.
Update to the latest version of Maybank app now to enjoy a better banking experience.

Hi Maybank users!

We are excited to inform you that something dazzling has officially landed!

You can now play Jewel Rush to win cash prizes!

All you have to do is tap on the Jewel Rush game icon and tap on as many jewels as you can. Be on the lookout for the Bonus Jewel to earn EXTRA cash.

Update to the latest version of Maybank app now and start playing!

Hello Maybank App users! We've got new updates just for you.

- More billers are now on the bill payments list! Pay your bills quickly and seamlessly on the app.
- Love promotions? You'll love the more user-friendly version of the Promotions feature that is now available on the app.

Don't forget to turn on Auto Updates to experience the latest features and upgrades from us.

Hey Maybankers! Here are the updates for this app version:

1. DeepaMoney is back! Send a monetary gift through your MAE E-Wallet or flash your DeepaMoney QR code to get a chance to play Jewel Rush

2. In celebration of the festival of lights, when you give towards a good cause, you’ll also get a chance to play Jewel Rush

3. Future and recurring payment receipts have been updated

Update the app to the latest version to enjoy a better banking experience!
Fixes the keyboard bug on iOS 13.2

Hello, everyone! As we’re getting closer to the New Year, here comes the last and final app update before we bid farewell to 2019:

1. We’ve squashed a few bugs (Yay!) and made more improvements in this release to make your banking experience better.

2. Ho ho ho! Feeling a little festive? Then check out our brand new Christmas app skin to get you in the mood for the Yuletide season.

3. Future dated receipt formats have been updated! So you won’t miss anything important anymore :)

Hello, everyone! As we’re getting closer to the New Year, here comes the last and final app update before we bid farewell to 2019:

1. Live Chat is now available on the Maybank App! Just login and tap ‘Need Help’ from the side menu to talk to us.
2. Maybank Privilege customers can check out exclusive deals and offers in the ‘Promotions’ section.
3. We’ve squashed a few bugs (yay!) and made more improvements in this release to make your banking experience better.

Hello everyone! As we usher in the Year of the Rat this Chinese New Year, here comes another app update :



1) Send money to your loved ones using e-Angpao.

2) Jewel Rush is back and we’re giving away RM450,000 worth of cash prizes!

3) We’ve squashed a few bugs (yay!) and made more improvements to make your banking experience better.

Hello everyone! To ensure that your account is safer and more secure, we have improved the password feature within the app. We have also squashed a few bugs (Yay!) and made more improvements for a better banking experience.

MERDEKA! MERDEKA!

In this special release, we’ve made some updates to celebrate the patriotic month of Merdeka and Hari Malaysia.

Let's join hands to ‘Bina Bersama’ the nation we love and support our local communities in need simply by making transactions on the Maybank2u app. You'll also earn chances to win your share of RM7 million worth of prizes through the Ganjaran Gemilang wheel with your eligible transactions. Update your app today and start making purposeful transactions. Happy Independence Day!

Thank you for using the Maybank2u app.

For this latest version, we've squashed a few bugs and did some behind the scenes app updates. Hurry and update the app now to enjoy a better banking experience with us today.

We're always making changes and improvements to the Maybank2u app such as service enhancements and minor bug fixes. Update to the latest version of Maybank2u app now to enjoy a better banking experience.

Hello there!

With 2020 coming to an end, we hope you continue to stay safe and healthy at all times. While keeping busy with year-end festivities, don't forget to check out the latest version of the Maybank2u app too.


In this app release, we’ve improved the following features and services:

Secure2u is now enabled for Cardless Withdrawal and Mobile Transfer
QRPay notification for transactions of RM1,000 and above
Push Notifications for scheduled future/recurring transaction
Additional fields (Address & Employment Details) for existing users when signing up for a MAE account
Minor bug fixes

That’s all from us! Remember to keep your app updated to enjoy a bug-free banking experience on the Maybank2u app.

Gong xi! Gong xi!

Let’s make it ONG this CNY with us! Simply perform eligible transactions (incl. e-Angpao) and play ‘All Sorts of ONG’ for your chance to WIN cash rewards and fantastic prizes.

In this release, ‘Instant Transfer’ is now known as ‘DuitNow - Instant Transfer’. You can send money conveniently via ‘DuitNow - Instant Transfer’ (bank account) or DuitNow ID to anyone from your app.

Update your app now and hope you enjoy a bug-free banking experience.

Happy Chinese New Year & stay safe!
